title: Nikhita Damaraju
text:
I am a second year PhD Student at the University of Washington’s Institute for Public Health Genetics jointly advised by Dr. Danny Miller and Dr. Brian Shirts. My research is focused on optimizing long-read sequencing data for clinical care and population genetics.


Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health | New York, NY | M.S in Biostatistics-Statistical Genetics | 2020 - 2022
